title: Spicy mini roasties
ingredients: ['20ml vegetable oil', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon chilli seasoning', '1 teaspoon minced red chilli', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon orange pepper', 'salt to taste', '1 large sweet potato (kumara), peeled and chopped into 2cm cubes', '1 large potato, peeled and chopped into 2cm cubes']
